Usually you don't even have to get these from a torrent. 

I just download the official release from the DVDFab fab website and use the same patch that worked for the last 10+ releases.

@ Tyr3ll and CHAOS1972 - I still do not understand how you get the patch to work? Can you download DvdFab to a folder on your desktop and then replace the patch or do you have to download DvdFab to you program files? It was much easier when there was a key!
